sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Home() { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to SAHYatri

Your Digital Gateway to Government Services. Access all citizen services in one place with transparency, efficiency, and security.

Explore Services Learn More
{/* Quick Services Section */}

Quick Access Services

Access essential government services with just a few clicks. All services are available 24/7.

Document Services

Apply for certificates, licenses, and official documents online

Apply Now →

Tax & Revenue

Pay taxes, check status, and manage your financial records

Pay Now →

Public Services

Access public utilities, welfare schemes, and community services

Explore →
{/* Statistics Section */}

SAHYatri in Numbers

Our impact on digital governance

10M+
Citizens Served
50+
Government Services
99.9%
Uptime Guarantee
24/7
Customer Support
{/* News & Announcements */}

Latest Updates

Stay informed about new services and important announcements

December 15, 2024

New Digital Certificate System

Introducing faster processing for birth, marriage, and other vital certificates with digital verification.

Read More →
December 10, 2024

Mobile App Launch

Access all SAHYatri services on your mobile device with our new official app for iOS and Android.

Read More →
December 5, 2024

Holiday Service Schedule

Updated service availability during the holiday season. Most services remain available 24/7.

Read More →
{/* Call to Action Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join millions of citizens who have simplified their government interactions with SAHYatri.

Contact Us About SAHYatri
); } export default Home;
